lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Friday about the Giants’ plans heading into the N.F.L. draft misstated a postseason statistic for the team’s promising young tight end, Kevin Boss, and gave the wrong timing for one of his performances against the Patriots. He had five, not eight, postseason catches. And four of those catches, including one for a touchdown, came in the final regular-season game against New England — not in the Super Bowl victory, in which he had one catch for 45 yards.
